roleset.name: to undo a ban

role.descr: action currently prohibited by ban, soon to be unbanned action
secondary agent, person unbanned from doing arg1 when separate

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: ...hoping the government will be encouraged to take further steps, such as freeing Nelson Mandela, the most prominent ANC figure, and PRO unbanning the organization.

example.name: All args
example.text: Mary unbanned John from using the TV remote after he promised not to chew on it.
example.arg: after he promised not to chew on it.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire, comparison to ban.01.
